synopsis.text: Crunchyroll and Adult Swim present BLADE RUNNER â€“ BLACK LOTUS, a thrilling anime series set in the futuristic landscape of Los Angeles, 2032. The story follows a mysterious young woman who awakens with no recollection of her past, yet possesses formidable combat skills. Intriguingly, she bears a striking tattoo of a black lotus and carries a locked data device, both of which serve as her only clues to unravel the enigma of her identity. As she navigates through the complexities of her forgotten past, she embarks on a relentless pursuit of those responsible for her ruthless history, determined to unveil the truth about who she really is. Join us in this captivating journey as we uncover the secrets of her lost identity alongside her.
